title: 330+ Cool, Creative, & Out-of-Pocket Private Story Names for Snapchat

steps.title: Drop a witty joke or one-liner for an unforgettable story name.
steps.content: Drop a witty joke or one-liner for an unforgettable story name. Your private story is the perfect place to reveal your true personality and show your close friends that you don’t take yourself too seriously. Throw out a funny, nonsensical, or self-deprecating line to make everyone laugh out loud: sorry mom RIP me 🪦 ps for my bs pegaSUS 🧐 Clown life 🤡 Swaggyttarius ✨anxie-tea✨ I survived 2020 2 swag 4 a dad 2 bomb 4 a mom Tomfoolery 🤸🤭 No one asked but: Hugs not drugs 🫂 depression session Trash University 🗑️ “That’s what” —She no daddy, just issues your dad’s basement just yapping 🗣️🗣️🗣️ I apologize in advance CEO of poor decisions POV: you’re my therapist Woke up and chose swag Going right cause dad left Live, laugh, losing my mind Eat. Sleep. Regret. Repeat. Mental breakdown hours 😭 Bed Bath and Bad Decisions why my parents are divorced: ya’ll sitting here like 👁️👄👁️ Can I speak to the manager? Registered flex offender ✨😌 50 shades of childhood trauma welcome to my last brain cell 🤪 Hey guys, welcome to my channel my mascara runs more than me 🏃‍♀️

steps.title: Pair two random words together to show off your sense of humor.
steps.content: Pair two random words together to show off your sense of humor. If you want to create a super original private story name, take a cue from Nickelodeon’s hit show iCarly and smash two words together. You can choose an adjective and a noun, two nouns, or whatever word combo gives you the giggles. The more random and ridiculous, the better! Melon zit Taco party Spicy igloo Hairy raisin Elbow rage Tuna socks Sparkly foot Fries matter Evil cheeses Sweaty alien Doctor sushi Oily elevator Fudge patrol Jolly banana Rubber toast Lizard dance Church pants Electric spam Queasy onion Wobbly donut Liquid chicken Scuba donkey Coffee noodles Crunchy words Frozen ketchup Bouncy nachos Extra mothballs Cookie mischief Helpful meatballs Hot dog hoedown

steps.title: Highlight your wildest memories with an out-of-pocket private story name.
steps.content: Highlight your wildest memories with an out-of-pocket private story name. Private stories are meant for sharing the unhinged moments you don’t want everyone to see, and there’s no better way to capture the energy of a messy night out than with an equally crazy private story name. Use any of these alcohol- and party-related examples to show your friends you’re having a fun time: Rated R thotivities too lit to quit NSFW 😮‍💨🚨 Booze cruise Wine time 🍷 Tipsy talks 🍸 Whiskeypedia After hours 🌃 Wine or tequila? Vodka > Tequila Happy hangover Alcohol you later Wild for the night don’t tell my mom Midnight memories Bad and boozy 🍾 Menace to sobriety 50 shades of drunk Let the night be gin Fatherless behavior White girl wasted 🤪 Hope without the “P” Proof I left my house Parental advisory ⚠️ In alcohol we trust 🙏 Happy hour = best hour snitches get stitches 👊 Work hard, party harder blackout or back out 🍻 Call me Playboi Parti 😤 24 hours of madness 🥶 Hit me with your best shot What had happened was… Throwing it back since (your birth year)

steps.title: Stick with a motivating name to match the mood of your gym stories.
steps.content: Stick with a motivating name to match the mood of your gym stories. Whether you want to show off your gains or motivate others to hit the gym, these fitness-focused private story names are perfect for any gym selfie, progress video, or workout tutorial: Gainsville Pump it up The champ Just results Iron therapy Power plays Grit and gain The gain train Strength saga The fit formula Lift, laugh, love Workout warrior Health is wealth Weights > dates No pain, no gain Building my best Journey to jacked Sculpting success Rise and grind 💪 One rep at a time Eat. Gym. Repeat. My muscle journey Dedication in action Go hard or go home Nothing but gains 📈 Push it to the limit 🏋️ Beast mode activated Hustle for that muscle The workout whisperer Sweat now, shine later Progress not perfection Glowing and growing 🍑 Train or remain the same Stronger than your excuse Sore today. Strong tomorrow.

steps.title: Showcase your school spirit with an exciting story name.
steps.content: Showcase your school spirit with an exciting story name. Sharing late night adventures or confessions about your campus crush? These private story names are great for giving people a glimpse into your school life, whether you’re suffering from sleep deprivation or hitting a post-exam high: Locker life Dorm drama Going Greek Lecture lookz Hallway hype Frat Fotos 🤝 Major moves 📝 Freshmen feeds Semester stories Detention diaries Midterm mayhem Lunchtime laughs It’s all Greek to me Cs get degrees 💯 College crazies 🫨 CS majors only 🤓 Recess revelations All nighter nation 🗽 Kappa Feta Cheese College confessions Finals Fight Club 👊 Schoolyard sightings Classroom chronicles Campus captures 📸 Making it or faking it? Academic adventures Study break snaps 📚 Campus crusaders 🫡 Business school or bust bookworm broadcast 🐛

steps.title: Reference your favorite meme, movie, or TV show to make people laugh.
steps.content: Reference your favorite meme, movie, or TV show to make people laugh. One of the easiest ways to come up with a funny private story name is to refer to an iconic moment in pop culture history. Think of the most hilarious or questionable videos you’ve seen online and weave them into the name, or use any of the following examples: Robarazzi onlyfrans📸 ya like jazz? TheSlap.com I am McLovin Chum Bucket Call Me Daddy Nick at Nite 🧡 Rise n shine 🌞 cut the cameras all panic no disco not slim but shady Titanic swim team dr. phil’s waiting list 50 shades of failure You just got krissed! total drama island 🌴 Oops I did it again 🤫 LIVE! With (your name) what dora didn’t explore Suite life of (your name) Not the gumdrop buttons! LEGEN (wait for it) DARY Mickey Mouse trap house (your name) with a chance Bee Movie deleted scenes Yo MTV, welcome to my crib! Keeping up with (your name) a series of unfortunate events No metro, we stay boomin 🚀 Spider-Man: Dad Come Home The snack that smiles back 😉 The Marvelous Ms. (your name) From the desk of Robin Sparkles The Chilling Adventures of (your name)

steps.title: Show love to your squad by giving them a shoutout on your private story.
steps.content: Show love to your squad by giving them a shoutout on your private story. If you want to let your besties know how much they mean to you, dedicate your private story name to them. It’s an easy way to make them feel special and confirm that they’re in your inner circle. brat pack teen titans f.r.i.e.n.d.s. Trusted 🔒 Drama club Meme team Simp Nation crew love ❤️‍🔥 Homie Depot Secret squad Legends only power rangers Gucci Gang 🤝 Ride or dies 🎢 that’s ganggg 🤟 Fuller House 🏡 funeral guest list real ones only 🤞 V.I.P. members 🎟️ Lightning squad ⚡ the proud family 👪 for my day ones 🔗 Santa’s naughty list Cabbage patch kids people i actually like Bible study squad 🙏 (your name)’s disciples Where all my beaches at Congrats, you made it 🥇

steps.title: Include basic information in your story name if you post random content.
steps.content: Include basic information in your story name if you post random content. If you post on your private story regularly and don’t follow a specific theme, stick to a simple name so you don’t confuse your friends. These names work with any photo or video that you decide to upload on your Snap: Your initials (ex: A.W.💞) Your name (ex: y/n’s priv) Your country’s flag (ex: 🇧🇷🇺🇸) Your city (ex: NYC 🍎 🏙 🚕 ) Chapter *your age* (ex: Chapter 21) Est. in *your birth year* (ex: Est. in 2003) Your relationship status (ex: Single Pringle 🤠)

steps.title: Choose a cool and casual private story name to keep it low key.
steps.content: Choose a cool and casual private story name to keep it low key. If you’re not the type to take social media seriously, these effortlessly cool names are just for you! They don’t reveal too much about the type of content you’re posting because, let’s face it, your private stories are reserved for you and your homies. Spam Drafts the 411 Recents bloopers alter ego Premium Exclusive prime peeks Private party true story bro no boundaries lost and found We need to talk backstage pass Bonus episodes Stealth mode 🥷 keep it on the DL All snap, no cap 🧢 thanks for stopping by u won’t believe this 😱 welcome to my podcast Current state of the union

steps.title: Come up with a cute name if you’re sharing the highlights of your day.
steps.content: Come up with a cute name if you’re sharing the highlights of your day. If you’re using Private Stories to romanticize your life , you need a dreamy name to match the vibe. Use any of these soft and sweet names to showcase your favorite memories and show gratitude for the little things: pillow talk felt cute 😊 oh snap 👻 Tea time 🍵 it’s personal My world 🌎 sunset szn 🌇 my second life Dear diary…📖 Barbie World 👸 Mentally here 💭 Limited edition 💎 to be continued… adventure time 🌈 star in the making 🌟 head in the clouds ☁️ Behind the scenes 🎬 radical optimism 🦋🔮 romanticizing my life 🌹 my life is a movie 🍿🎥 🎞

steps.title: Use a sassy story name if you’re uploading selfies or fit pics.
steps.content: Use a sassy story name if you’re uploading selfies or fit pics. Trying to remind your Snap friends that you’re the baddest of them all? Choose any of these savage private story names to relay you’re cute, confident, fly, and one-of-a-kind: Keep up I’m 1 of 1 First place Enjoy the view Model behavior It’s all about me The top pick 🏆 The one and only I am the blueprint His baddest habit Booked and busy Best you ever had bad and boujee 💎 Main character mode All I do is win, win, win Don’t trust nobody ❌ Update, I’m still perfect My way or the highway Your newest obsession too glam to give a damn Assignment, understood Never chase, just replace I love men without the “n” Find me in his search bar Tell the group chat I said hi and that’s on period ✨💅 Depressed but well-dressed My face card never declines The type you won’t find twice What dreams are made of 🫧

steps.title: Add kawaii-inspired emoticons to stand out from other stories.
steps.content: Add kawaii-inspired emoticons to stand out from other stories. Can’t think of any witty or original names? Throw out a sweet emoticon that matches the mood of your story instead! Whether you opt for a winking face or a strand of sparkling stars, these adorable options are fun, playful, and unique: (>ᴗ•) ₊˚⊹♡ ᶻ 𝗓 𐰁 .ᐟ ̗ ̗ര́ ̬꤮ ̗ ̗ (˶˃ ᵕ ˂˶) ≽^•⩊•^≼ ໒꒰ྀི ˶• ༝ •˶꒱ྀི১ ⋅˚₊‧ ୨୧ ‧₊˚ ⋅ ♫⋆｡♪ ₊˚♬ ﾟ 𖡼𖤣𖥧𖡼𓋼𖤣𖥧𓋼𓍊 ｡⋆｡˚ ʚïɞ ˚｡⋆｡ ˚₊‧꒰ა ☆ ໒꒱ ‧₊˚ ദ്ദി(˵ •̀ ᴗ - ˵ ) ✧ ｡ ₊°༺❤︎༻°₊ ｡ ‎‧₊˚✧ (name) ✧˚₊‧ ⋆˚࿔ (name) ! 𝜗𝜚˚⋆ ⊹ ࣪ ﹏𓊝﹏𓂁﹏⊹ ࣪ ˖ ᯓ★ (name) ★彡 ⋆˚✿˖° (name) ⋆˚✿˖° ‧₊˚ ⋅(๑ᵔ⤙ᵔ๑) 𓐐𓎩 ‧₊˚ ⋅ ♈︎ ♌︎ ♐︎ ♉︎ ♍︎ ♑︎ ♊︎ ♎︎ ♒︎ ♋︎ ♏︎ ♓︎

steps.title: Open Snapchat and click on the profile icon in the top left-hand corner.
steps.content: Open Snapchat and click on the profile icon in the top left-hand corner. Under the “My Stories” tab, select the “New Private Story” button and choose who can view your story. Hit “Create Story” at the bottom of the screen, then fill in the text box and click “Done” to save your story. The name of your story must be 30 characters or less (including spaces), and you can create up to 20 Private or Shared Stories at a time. [1] X Research source To rename a private story, click on your profile and click on the 3 dots to the right of your private story. Hit “Rename Story,” then fill in the text box and click “Done” to save your changes.
